summary: During his final days, a dying man is reunited with old friends, former lovers, his ex-wife, and his estranged son.
cast: Rémy Girard|Stéphane Rousseau|Marie-Josée Croze|Marina Hands|Dorothée Berryman|Johanne-Marie Tremblay|Pierre Curzi|Yves Jacques|Louise Portal|Dominique Michel|Isabelle Blais|Toni Cecchinato|Sophie Lorain|Mitsou|Markita Boies|Micheline Lanctôt|Denis Bouchard|Sylvie Drapeau|Jean-Marc Parent|Dominic Darceuil|Yves Desgagnés|Gilles Pelletier|Jean-René Ouellet|Lise Roy|Macha Grenon|Gaston Lepage|Daniel Brière|Sébastien Huberdeau|Rose-Maïté Erkoreka|Roy Dupuis|David Gow|Sébastien Ricard|Janique Kearns|Sean Lu|Eric Paulhus|Sofia de Medeiros|Bonnie Mak|Alain Bruno|Anna-Marie Sutherland|Jean Antoine Charest|Dawn Lambing|Karen Hader|Valérie Jeanneret|Kenneth Fernandez|Julie Tu|Jacques Caron|Shawn McPherson|Nhu Tram Nguyen|Daisy Bhui-Khac|Frédéric Gilles|Valérie Wiseman|Stéphane Touzin|Hélène-Manon Poudrette|Yvette Thuot|François Domerc|Julie Beauchemin|Fanny Mallette|Victoria Obermayer|Ines Orsini|Denys Arcand|Julie Christie|Chris Evert|Françoise Hardy|Karen Kain
title: Las invasiones bárbaras
